mapper.select: select seq, title, content, regdate, nickname, visited from board order by regdate desc
mapper.insert: insert into board (seq, title, content, nickname, regdate) values ((select nvl(max(seq)+1, 1) from board), #{title }, #{content }, #{nickname }, sysdate)
mapper.update: update board set title=#{title }, content=#{content } where seq=#{seq }
